messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Kilts
messages.msgSnippet: I Have seen a couple guys sporting these with straight faces around Seattle,I think they re made here! Definately not for the shy!!I Love EM!!! Just thinking
messages.messageBody:
I Have seen a couple guys sporting these with straight faces around
Seattle,I think they're made here! Definately not for the shy!!I Love EM!!!
Just thinking off my guy in one cracks me up! He may be too British! A tad!
I'm a newbie only lurked a week or so. I'm on an Isle in WA. Just
begining to seek other unschoolers. I've Settled for being one of three on
this Isle.(not bad) But I'm pretty outgoing/opinionated, and they gaurd
their privacy like alot of small towners.Oh, I'm 36.Mom to 13yob and 4yog
zen masters.
Molly
